column4: anyone here have 5.1 speakers and asus nvidia soundcard (onboard) nVidia Corporation CK804 AC'97 Audio Controller? i dont have sound in rear and center speakers. ive installed the nforce driver, my motherboard is a/k 8n-4, anyone know of something i could read/howto?
my mobo supports that too.. and i havent been able to get it, i just duplicated front and back sound
: how did you duplicate the sound?
my sub has a switch to handle that.. i just flipped it, im not really sure how to do it in linux
